LanguageData.TinyTweaks.GameRestartNotRequired: Note: Changes made to these settings will be applied instantly - a game restart is not required.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.GameRestartRequired: Note: Game restart required in order for any changes to these settings to take effect.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.QoLChanges.AutoAssignAnimalFo: Automatically assign animals to follow their master
Animals that have been trained in obedience will automatically be assigned to follow their master when drafted or doing fieldwork.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.QoLChanges.AutoRemoveTerrainP: Moisture pumps that have finished pumping will be automatically designated to be uninstalled or deconstructed, whichever is appropriate.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.QoLChanges.AlphabeticalBillLi: The drop-down list when clicking the 'Bills' button on any workbench will be sorted alphabetically.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.QoLChanges.ChangeBuildableDef: Certain architect menu tabs from certain mods will be merged with vanilla architect tabs (e.g. 'Furniture+' from More Furniture merged into 'Furniture'). In some cases, new architect tabs may be added too (e.g. buildings from LWM Deep Storage will get their own 'Storage' tab).
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.QoLChanges.ChangeDefLabels_To: The labels of things such as items and recipe bills will be cased just like vanilla (e.g. White Composite Water Tower => White composite water tower).
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.BugFixes.MeleeArmourPenetrati: Preset armour penetration values for melee weapons such as spears will scale with the weapon's quality and stuff it's made out of.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.BalanceChanges.BloodPumpingAf: Pawn bleed rates will be multiplied by their blood pumping capacities.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.BalanceChanges.ChangeQualityD: Skill matters significantly more when producing items that have quality. Quality distribution is also centred around level 6 instead of level 4.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.BalanceChanges.DelayedSkillDe: 8 in-game hours must pass since a pawn last gained at least 2000 experience in a given skill before skill decay kicks in.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.BalanceChanges.Vanilla_ToolTi: Normalises construction and smoothing speed to 100% like all other speed stats.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.BalanceChanges.DubsBadHygiene: Reduces the steel requirement for building log boilers from 200 to 100 and reduces the beauty values of all fixtures.
